body: Rin once again proving herself as best girl.
I love it! We need more of this! Not ugly bastards or NTR, but this. Also hoping for FSN Remake and FHA Adaptation. Wish they gave us a kiss scene of Shirou and Rin.

Ohhhhhh-Ho-Ho-Ho-Ho-Ho ..... Page 18 - Rin reveals her feelings for Shirou while half-asleep, following a round of (a-hem) "mana transfer". Many ladies who may have (a-hem, again) some IN-terest in Emiya-kun are surprised, shocked and generally Not Amused * Page 19 - Shirou suddenly feels "... a great disturbance in the Force." * PRICELESS!
